text:
Instead of an action, I'd suggest to implement a Selector. Actions are rather
deprecated because of their ambiguous semantics (sitemap logic with side
effects), Selectors are conceptually cleaner.

See also
http://cocoon.apache.org/2.1/apidocs/org/apache/cocoon/acting/ResourceExistsAction.html

(NOTE in javadoc comment)
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
Use resource-exists selector instead. Will open another bug for the fix/patch of
the default sitemap.xmap file.
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com

text:
Sorry that I didn't reply to the other thread yesterday, but wouldn't this work
instead?

[...]
<map:select type="resource-exists">
  <map:when test="{fallback://xslt/page2xhtml-{4}.xsl}">
[...]
creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
